description technical detail:
ViewSonic 22" 1920x1080 5ms Analogue DVI USB LED Monitor
The 22" ViewSonic TD2220 is a multi-touch Full HD LED backlit monitor with 1920 x 1080 resolution, DVI & VGA inputs and VESA mountable design. It has 20,000,000:1 MEGA dynamic contrast ratio for sharp crisp images and Eco-mode for up to 40% energy savings come standard in the 22" offering. The TD2220 is a one-stop solution for your multi-touch monitor needs.
